name: Christine
description:
Christine.
The physical piece will be shipped upon purchase of the NFT. Unique piece made in sandstone entirely done by hands, no mold used. 
Sculpture of that size sells in galleries for higher prices, here you are basically getting the NFT for free & a discount price. You also help the artist sell his art directly (galleries take usually 50% commissions)
In addition to that, you get the original sketch of the piece on paper. 
Owner of this NFT will also have an exclusive visit to the artist’s studio in Paris. 
A certificate of authenticity has been minted with Verisart for the physical piece and will be transferred to the new owner.
Shipping is included worldwide. Size of the physical piece : Height 42cm(16,5in) Width 36cm(14in)
